.class public auto ansi sealed PropertyTabChangedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

type PropertyTabChangedEventHandler = delegate of obj * PropertyTabChangedEventArgs -> unit

Docs.param: A that contains the event data.
Docs.summary: Represents the method that will handle the event of a .

remarks.format:
## Remarks When you create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PropertyTabChangedEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
